backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing a feature update involving the Valentine prompt UI and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains autogenerated summaries of key frontend files including App, ValentinePrompt, CSS, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup with theme variables and dark mode overrides for colors and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Entry HTML file providing the root container and loading the React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders ValentinePrompt centered on the screen within a full-height layout.
Interactive Valentine prompt with moving No button, Yes-triggered meme reveal, and collision-aware repositioning logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind layer defining romantic-themed OKLCH color variables and utility classes with gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, animations, romantic theme variables, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, and features for a romantic single‑page Valentine web app with Yes/No buttons, evasive No behavior, and a celebratory meme on Yes. Includes thematic, UI, and asset-handling specifications along with versioned feature metadata.
